title: Carrot-ginger dressing
ingredients: ['2 carrots, peeled and roughly chopped', '2 tablespoons peeled and roughly chopped fresh ginger', '1 small shallot, roughly chopped (optional)', '2 tablespoons white miso paste', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons grapeseed oil or other oil (optional)', '1 tablespoon sesame oil']
